subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The New York Racing Association fired its chief executive, Charles Hayward, and its chief counsel, Patrick Kehoe, as the state investigates why $8.5 million in winnings was not paid to bettors.
snippet: The New York Racing Association fired its chief executive, Charles Hayward, and its chief counsel, Patrick Kehoe, as the state investigates why $8.5 million in winnings was not paid to bettors.
